lead_paragraph: The American Library Association has added an award for gay and lesbian literature to its annual prizes for children's books. The prizes, which include the prestigious John Newbery and Randolph Caldecott medals, will be announced on Jan. 10.
snippet: Tthe Stonewall Children's and Young Adult Literature Award, for a book "of exceptional merit relating to the gay, lesbian, bisexual and transgendered experience," will be given by the American Library Association, which also awards the Newbery and...

headline.main: Prize Is Created for Gay Literature for Young Readers

abstract: Tthe Stonewall Children's and Young Adult Literature Award, for a book "of exceptional merit relating to the gay, lesbian, bisexual and transgendered experience," will be given by the American Library Association, which also awards the Newbery and Caldecott prizes.
